answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Hi Joseph - Happy New Year!  Check with the City of Colorado Springs, CO.  Ann Crossey will be a good resource for you as they provide year-round perscription services.  Ann's contact information is - acrossey@springsgov.com or 
1-719-385-5117.
Take care,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Joseph Gall
text:
Our city participates once or twice a year in a statewide prescription drug turn-in event which has proven to be quite successful.  We are wondering if there are any cities or counties around the US that has developed a program that is available on a more frequent, routine basis?  If you know of such a program or have a program, we would love to hear from you.  We are interested in developing a program where citizens could drop-off their unused, unwanted prescription drugs here at City Hall on any workday.
Thank you in advance for your input!
title: Prescription Drug Turn-In Programs
